moral: Grasp at the shadow and you will lose the substance.
fable: In the heat of the desert, a thirsty dog discovered a pool of water. As he bent down to drink, he saw another dog in the reflection, holding what appeared to be a larger, juicier bone. Blinded by greed, he dropped his bone into the water to snatch the bigger one, only to find out that the other dog and the bone were just reflections. When he tried to retrieve his own bone, it had sunk too deep into the pool to reach.
